divs: Sighting DetailsI Was Sitting in My living Room When my sister started yelling my name shouting come here look it's a UFO so i got up from the sofa and opened my window she pointed into the sky that's when I notice the lights turning on and off. It look so close by and it was moving in circles When I first saw it we thought it was a plane but suddenly a plane past by and we knew it couldn't be a plane it looked like a saturn like object it looked really big and it seemed so close we followed it until it moved away and we couldn't see it anymore. We couldnt believe it we had just seen a UFO I tried to take pictures with my cell but i couldn't
Summary: had very colorful flashing lights that would turn on and off
